A. In the [ggplot2 repository](https://github.com/tidyverse/ggplot2), click on "README.md":

![](explore1.png)

B. Click on "History" in the Top Right Corner

![](explore2.png)

C. Click on one of the commits and look at changes

![](explore3.png)

D. If you have time, click on "Issues" in the top tab and look at one of the issues:

![](explore4.png)
